text:
Clubhouse | Freelance Technical Writer | New York, NY | Remote Possible

Clubhouse is looking for a developer-who-writes OR a writer-who-programs to have on call for writing more technically-focussed marketing content for Clubhouse Software (https://clubhouse.io) e.g. discussions around programming languages, tech stacks, code analysis and debugging, interviews with other developers etc.

If that's you, or you know someone who fits the bill, please let me know! Also, no recruiters / talent agencies please.

Email: ben@clubhouse.io LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bgsmartin/
